name: Farm Snow: Happy Christmas Story With Toys & Santa
name_original: Farm Snow: Happy Christmas Story With Toys & Santa
description:
The New Year has arrived! Visit Santa Claus on his farm at the North Pole. Bake Candy and Cookie! Evolve snow farm to X-mas city and magic township. Evolve Santa workshop from a farm to the magic village. Build snow town and help Santa with gifts for childrens. Be prepered to the Santa Claus snow country: grow hay every day, receive letters from all the children of the world and send sleighs laden with gifts. As a reward, pick up candies and cookies. Expand your production: build Christmas buildings, harvest hay and magic trees, manufacture all kinds of toys. Take the help of naughty Christmas fairies and become friends with the funny snowman. Decorate the Christmas tree and listen the Christmas carols. You have to be prepared before the bell rings on New Year's Eve. The magic of Christmas is here!

Facebook Group: https://www.facebook.com/Happy-New-Year-Farm-Christmas-Community-245121402573685/
